events.message: I received my order yesterday, but unfortunately the item is damaged with visible scratches and a small crack on the surface.

An agent has been assigned to handle your case regarding the damaged product you received.

Could you please provide photos of the damaged item and let us know when you received the package?
Here are the photos showing the scratches and the crack, and I received the package yesterday in the afternoon.
